attributes.action: address reports that the elderly are being financially abused by the banking system - please call for existing legislation to be enforced and for those guilty of elderly financial abuse to be prosecuted. Th risks of financial abuse of the elderly should be eradicated by better policing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Older people are at greater risk of financial abuse than ever before because of internet banking and the closure of post offices, a charity has warned.

Help the Aged said financial abuse was now thought to be second only to neglect as the greatest threat to older people.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
